dao

Class DocumentTermList

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.DocumentTermList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDocumentTermList

    public class DocumentTermList
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDocumentTermList
    Inverted PostingsList, this class stores one row in the DocumentTermMatrix.

      • DocumentTermList

        public DocumentTermList()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(int termID)
        Adds the specified termID to the list. While we are still adding terms, the values are still term frequencies! Thus, repeated calls of this method with the same termID will not add additional entries to the list, but merely increase the termFrequency by 1 for each call.
        Specified by:
        add in interface IDocumentTermList

      • add

        public void add(int termID,
       float value)
        Adds the specified entry to the list. If the entry contained the element, the value is increased by the specified amount. Else a new entry with the provided value is created.
        Parameters:
        termID - The termID of the term to add.
        value -

      • doubleSize

        public void doubleSize()
        Description copied from interface: IDocumentTermList
        Doubles the amount of preallocated memory for this list.
        Specified by:
        doubleSize in interface IDocumentTermList

        public boolean isFull()
        Description copied from interface: IDocumentTermList
        Returns whether this list is full or not.
        Specified by:
        isFull in interface IDocumentTermList
        Returns:
        true if the list is full, otherwise false.

      • getTermFrequency

        public java.lang.Float getTermFrequency(java.lang.Integer termID)
        Returns the term frequency of the provided termID. This method assumes that IDFs have not been calculated yet (since that would overwrite termFrequency values).
        Parameters:
        termID -
        Returns:

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all elements from this list.

      • applyTfThresholds

        public int applyTfThresholds(int lowThresh,
                    int highThresh)
        Applies termFrequency Thresholding using the provided thresholds. This method assumes that IDFs have not been calculated yet (since that would overwrite termFrequency values).
        Parameters:
        lowThresh -
        highThresh -
        Returns:
        The number of terms removed;

      • sortTermsByID

        public void sortTermsByID()
        Sorts this termList by termID.

      • calculateIDFs

        public void calculateIDFs(Vocabulary vocabulary)
        Calculates the IDF for the entries of this list. This method assumes that IDFs have not been calculated yet. Overwrites the values of this list with the newly calculated IDFs. Also see DocumentTermMatrix.
        Parameters:
        vocabulary -
